slideShowAddress: Located in calle Triana / 30, Las Palmas de Gran Canaria
aboutUsText:
We are not your one night pizza .
We want quality, althought you eat that pizza in your car
It is not pure, we didn't invent the pizzas .
We are the guardians of their true essence

Lovers of BACK TO PIZZA.
That one that leaves you full, That one that keeps yourself up.
The pizza's texture and the cheese quality
We feel every bite like a kiss in your head

That one that brings with fine texture...
That one that you don't gonna regret .
THAT ONE THAT KEEPS US PROUD
